name: Red Boi and White Boi
description:
Game Made for the 2021 GMTK game jam. 

IMPORTANT: The Two Faces in the bottom left of the screen is to switch between the camera pov between red boi and white boi.

Play as Red Boi and White Boi and complete the levels. Their health is joined together, overall they have to work together to complete the game!

Game by DevNugget on YouTube.
